optionDef.label: Welcome message for the Direct Console User Interface (DCUI)
optionDef.summary: A welcome message in the initial screen of the Direct Console User Interface (DCUI). Use an empty string to reset to the default message.

optionDef.label: Flush interval
optionDef.summary: Flush at this interval (milliseconds)

optionDef.label: Maximum dirty buffers
optionDef.summary: Block writers if this many buffers are dirty (percent)

optionDef.label: PerFileHardMaxDirty
optionDef.summary: Block writers if this many buffers of a given file are dirtied (percent)

optionDef.label: Soft maximum dirty buffers
optionDef.summary: Flush immediately if this many buffers are dirty (percent)

optionDef.label: DCacheMemReserved
optionDef.summary: Memory consumed by CBRC Data Cache (in MB)

optionDef.label: DCacheSize
optionDef.summary: Size of CBRC Data Cache in MB. This cannot be changed if CBRC.Enable is set to 1.

optionDef.label: DigestJournalBootInterval
optionDef.summary: Interval (in minutes) for which Digest Journal is temporarily disabled to avoid interfering with the boot process

optionDef.label: Enable
optionDef.summary: Enable Content Based Read Cache

optionDef.label: COWMaxHeapSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the COW heap is allowed to grow

optionDef.label: security.host.ruissl
optionDef.summary: Require SSL to be used when communicating with the host over port 902.

optionDef.label: guest.commands.sharedPolicyRefCount
optionDef.summary: Reference count to enable guest operations.

optionDef.label: log.level
optionDef.summary: Controls the global log level.

optionDef.label: plugins.hostsvc.esxAdminsGroup
optionDef.summary: Active Directory group name that is automatically granted administrator privileges on the ESX.

optionDef.label: plugins.hostsvc.esxAdminsGroupAutoAdd
optionDef.summary: Controls whether the group specified by 'esxAdminsGroup' is automatically granted administrator permission.

optionDef.label: plugins.hostsvc.esxAdminsGroupUpdateInterval
optionDef.summary: Interval between checks for whether the group specified by 'esxAdminsGroup' has appeared in Active Directory, in minutes.

optionDef.label: plugins.vimsvc.authValidateInterval
optionDef.summary: Number of minutes between each validation of all known users and groups - set to zero to disable validation.

optionDef.label: plugins.vimsvc.userSearch.maxResults
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of users and groups to display in the Add Permissions dialog - set to zero to disable the limit.

optionDef.label: plugins.vimsvc.userSearch.maxTimeSeconds
optionDef.summary: Number of seconds to wait for a search for users and groups to return results - set to zero to disable the timeout.

optionDef.label: ActionLoadThreshold
optionDef.summary: load threshold below which vcpu affinity migration is performed, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: ActiveReadyAdjust
optionDef.summary: adjust the activeReady time estimation based on run/(run+sleep) ratio, 0 to disable the adjustment

optionDef.label: AllowWideVsmp
optionDef.summary: Allow VMs with more VCPUs than host PCPUs, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: Bound lag quanta
optionDef.summary: Number of global quanta before bound lag

optionDef.label: CommRateThreshold
optionDef.summary: threshold for inter-sched-context rate above which the contexts are considered to be related (in num/sec)

optionDef.label: CoschedCostartThreshold
optionDef.summary: costart threshold in usec, costart threshold should be less than costopThreshold

optionDef.label: CoschedCostopThreshold
optionDef.summary: maximum skew between vcpus in usec, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: CoschedCrossCall
optionDef.summary: 0: disable cosched on crosscall; 1: enable cosched on crosscall

optionDef.label: CoschedHandoffLLC
optionDef.summary: 0: handoff by switching pcpu; 1: handoff to LLC if possible

optionDef.label: CoschedHandoffSkip
optionDef.summary: only skip handoff if ready time is smaller than this threshold, in usec, 0 to allow skip always

optionDef.label: CoschedPollUsec
optionDef.summary: interval between coscheduling skew checks, in usec

optionDef.label: CoschedPreempt
optionDef.summary: 0: handoff on cosched request; 1: preempt on cosched request

optionDef.label: Credit age period
optionDef.summary: Period in milliseconds

optionDef.label: DefaultImpact
optionDef.summary: the default expected efficiency loss when the related contexts are not running on the same LLC (in percentage)

optionDef.label: DisableMicrocodeUpdate
optionDef.summary: Disable microcode update.

optionDef.label: FairnessRebalancePcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when doing fairness rebalance, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: HTRebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within a core

optionDef.label: HTStolenAgeThreshold
optionDef.summary: the amount of htStolen time a vcpu can keep without being aged (in seconds)

optionDef.label: HTWholeCoreThreshold
optionDef.summary: a vcpu with vtime falling behind by this threshold (in ms) is eligible to use the whole core (HT only), 0 to disable (may violate resource settings)

optionDef.label: HostRebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within the whole system, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: IdleHTRebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: usec between chances to do HT rebalance when idle (0 to disable, 100000 max)

optionDef.label: IdleTopologyRebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: msec between chances to do topology rebalance when idle (0 to disable)

optionDef.label: Intra-core migrate
optionDef.summary: When to allow intra-core migrations [0:when inter-core migration allowed, 1:always]

optionDef.label: L2RebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within the shared L2 cache, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: L3RebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within the shared L3 cache, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: LimitEnforcementThreshold
optionDef.summary: Only allows low-vtime children ro run when a group/VM's vtimeLimit is smaller than the global virtual time by less than this threshold (in ms), 0 to disable

optionDef.label: MaxSampleRateLg
optionDef.summary: Sampling system services at most (2^MaxSampleRateLg) times a second

optionDef.label: MoveCurrentRunnerPcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when searching for runner move opportunity, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: MultiCoreEnhancements
optionDef.summary: Bitmask of multicore enhancements. Bit 0: Topology load balance; 1: Long term balance; 2: Runner-moves.

optionDef.label: NonTimerWakeupRate
optionDef.summary: Disable P state if the running vcpu's non-timer wakeup rate is higher than this threshold, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: PackageRebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within a package, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: PcpuMigrateIdlePcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when doing pcpu idle rebalance, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: Quantum
optionDef.summary: Quantum in milliseconds

optionDef.label: SchedPerfOptimizations
optionDef.summary: Bitmask of performance counter based scheduler optimizations. Bit 0: Enable performance counter statistics; 1: Cache occupancy estimation

optionDef.label: UnifiedMigrate
optionDef.summary: 1: enable unified migration algorithm, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: UseMwait
optionDef.summary: use MWAIT vs. HLT in the idle loop; 0: use HLT, 1: use MWAIT if possible, 2: choose by cpu type

optionDef.label: Enable admission check per virtual CPU
optionDef.summary: Perform additional admission control check that per virtual CPU virtual machine minimum does not exceed the speed of a single physical CPU

optionDef.label: WakeupMigrateCorunPcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when doing wakeup corun rebalance, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: WakeupMigrateIdlePcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when doing wakeup idle rebalance, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: HardwareAcceleratedInit
optionDef.summary: Enable hardware accelerated VMFS data initialization (requires compliant hardware)

optionDef.label: HardwareAcceleratedMove
optionDef.summary: Enable hardware accelerated VMFS data movement (requires compliant hardware)

optionDef.label: AlgoType
optionDef.summary: Digest Crypto Hash Type (1=SHA-1, 2=SHA-256).

optionDef.label: BlockSize
optionDef.summary: Blocksize in the original VMDK to compute crypto hash codes. In pages of 4K size. Value needs to be power of 2.

optionDef.label: CollisionEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable collision detection (0=disabled, 1=enabled)

optionDef.label: JournalCoverage
optionDef.summary: Journal coverage in MB. Value needs to be power of 2.

optionDef.label: UpdateOnClose
optionDef.summary: Enable crypto-hash updates on DiskLib_Close (0=disabled, 1=enabled).

optionDef.label: MaxDentryPerObj
optionDef.summary: Maximum directory entries cached per directory

optionDef.label: BandwidthCap
optionDef.summary: cap on disk bandwidth (KB/s) usage

optionDef.label: CheckProtMBR
optionDef.summary: Check for protective MBR on GPT disks

optionDef.label: Delay on busy
optionDef.summary: Delay in milliseconds for completion of commands with a BUSY status

optionDef.label: DeviceReclaimTime
optionDef.summary: The number of seconds between device re-claim attempts

optionDef.label: DiskDelayPDLHelper
optionDef.summary: Delay PDL helper in secs

optionDef.label: DiskMaxIOSize
optionDef.summary: Max Disk READ/WRITE I/O size before splitting (in KB)

optionDef.label: DiskPseudoUniqueID
optionDef.summary: enables synthesis of persistent pseudo-unique UUIDs for local devices that don.t support EVPD Inquiry

optionDef.label: DiskReservationThreshold
optionDef.summary: Time window within which refcounted reservations on a device are permitted (in msec)

optionDef.label: DiskRetryPeriod
optionDef.summary: Retry period in milliseconds for a command with retry status

optionDef.label: DumpMaxRetries
optionDef.summary: Max number of I/O retries during disk dump

optionDef.label: DumpPollDelay
optionDef.summary: Number of microseconds to wait between polls during a disk dump.

optionDef.label: DumpPollMaxRetries
optionDef.summary: Max number of device poll retries during disk dump

optionDef.label: EnableNaviReg
optionDef.summary: Enable automatic NaviAgent registration with EMC CLARiiON and Invista

optionDef.label: Maximum LUN
optionDef.summary: Only LUNs with LUN ID values below this value will be scanned

optionDef.label: Maximum reset latency
optionDef.summary: Delay in milliseconds before logging warnings and spawning new reset worlds if a reset is overdue or taking too long

optionDef.label: Path evaluation time
optionDef.summary: The number of seconds between FC path evaluations

optionDef.label: PreventVMFSOverwrite
optionDef.summary: Prevent overwriting VMFS partitions

optionDef.label: QFullSampleSize
optionDef.summary: I/O samples to monitor for detecting non-transient queue full condition. Should be nonzero to enable queue depth throttling.

optionDef.label: QFullThreshold
optionDef.summary: BUSY or QFULL threshold, upon which LUN queue depth will be throttled. Should be <= QFullSampleSize if throttling is enabled.

optionDef.label: ReqCallThreshold
optionDef.summary: Threshold in number of pending requests before calling into vmkernel to process the requests

optionDef.label: Reset latency
optionDef.summary: Delay in milliseconds between reset thread wakeups

optionDef.label: Reset maximum retries
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of bus reset retries. Set to 0 for no limit.

optionDef.label: Reset overdue log period
optionDef.summary: Delay in seconds between logs of overdue reset

optionDef.label: Reset period
optionDef.summary: Delay in seconds between bus resets retries

optionDef.label: Reset thread expires
optionDef.summary: Life in seconds of an inactive reset handle thread

optionDef.label: Reset thread maximum
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of reset handler threads

optionDef.label: Reset thread minimum
optionDef.summary: Minimum number of reset handler threads

optionDef.label: Retry unit attention
optionDef.summary: Retry all SCSI commands that return a unit attention error

optionDef.label: ReturnCCForNoSpace
optionDef.summary: Return CC 0x7/0x27/0x7 in the event where a backing datastore has run out of space as opposed to posting a monitor event to halt the VM

optionDef.label: Scheduled number of outstanding requests
optionDef.summary: Number of outstanding commands to a target with competing worlds

optionDef.label: Scheduled QControl sequence requests
optionDef.summary: Number of consecutive requests from a virtual machine required to raise the outstanding commands to maximum

optionDef.label: Scheduled QControl VM switches
optionDef.summary: Number of switches between commands issued by different virtual machines required to reduce outstanding commands to CONFIG_DISK_CIF

optionDef.label: Scheduled quantum
optionDef.summary: Number of consecutive requests from one world

optionDef.label: Sector maximum difference
optionDef.summary: Distance in sectors at which the disk BW schedules affinity stops

optionDef.label: Shares high
optionDef.summary: Shares for high disk priority

optionDef.label: Shares low
optionDef.summary: Shares for low disk priority

optionDef.label: Shares normal
optionDef.summary: Shares for normal disk priority

optionDef.label: Support sparse LUN
optionDef.summary: Support for sparse LUNs if set to one

optionDef.label: ThroughputCap
optionDef.summary: cap on disk throughput (IO/s) usage

optionDef.label: Use device reset
optionDef.summary: Use device reset (instead of bus reset) to reset a SCSI device

optionDef.label: Use LUN reset
optionDef.summary: Use LUN reset (instead of device.bus reset) to reset a SCSI device

optionDef.label: Use report LUN
optionDef.summary: Use the REPORT LUN command to increase scanning speed for devices

optionDef.label: FSSLightWeightProbe
optionDef.summary: Enable light-weight efficient probe of ESX supported datastores

optionDef.label: AckIntervalMax
optionDef.summary: Maximum time in microseconds between acks

optionDef.label: AckIntervalMin
optionDef.summary: Minimum time in microseconds between acks

optionDef.label: BackupConnectTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time in milliseconds to wait for the backup to connect

optionDef.label: BackupExtraTimeout
optionDef.summary: Extra milliseconds before backup declares primary dead

optionDef.label: BadExecLatency
optionDef.summary: Latency considered bad execution latency(ms)

optionDef.label: BindToVmknic
optionDef.summary: Bind the FT socket to a specific vmknic

optionDef.label: ChargeVMXForFlush
optionDef.summary: Charge the VMX world for log flushing instead of the global flush world

optionDef.label: CheckFCPathState
optionDef.summary: Check storage path state

optionDef.label: CheckForProgress
optionDef.summary: Check for progress on the backup and/or primary

optionDef.label: CoreDumpNoProgressMS
optionDef.summary: Milliseconds before live coredump vmm and vmx if progress isn't made

optionDef.label: ExecLatencyKill
optionDef.summary: Time to wait for good latency before killing a slow backup(ms)

optionDef.label: ExtraLogTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time in milliseconds for temporary increase in timeout

optionDef.label: FillAffinity
optionDef.summary: Set the fill world/worldlet affinity to the tcp worldlet

optionDef.label: FillWorldlet
optionDef.summary: Fill the buffer from a worldlet

optionDef.label: FlushReservationMax
optionDef.summary: The maximum amount of CPU to reserve for the async flush world

optionDef.label: FlushReservationMin
optionDef.summary: The minimum amount of CPU to reserve for the async flush world

optionDef.label: FlushSleep
optionDef.summary: Sleep time in milliseconds when nothing to flush

optionDef.label: FlushWorldlet
optionDef.summary: Flush the buffer from a worldlet

optionDef.label: GlobalFlushWorld
optionDef.summary: Use a global async flush world

optionDef.label: GoodExecLatency
optionDef.summary: Latency considered good execution latency(ms)

optionDef.label: HeartbeatCount
optionDef.summary: Number of failed heartbeats before declare dead.

optionDef.label: HostTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time in milliseconds before declare FT host dead

optionDef.label: IORetryExtraInterval
optionDef.summary: Sleep extra interval (msec) between I/O reissuing on I/O error

optionDef.label: IORetryInterval
optionDef.summary: Sleep interval (msec) between I/O reissuing on I/O error

optionDef.label: IORetryTimes
optionDef.summary: Maximum disk I/O reissuing times on I/O error

optionDef.label: LogBufferStallSleep
optionDef.summary: Sleep time in milliseconds when log buffer is full on the primary

optionDef.label: LogTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time in milliseconds to wait on log socket

optionDef.label: LongFlushDebugMS
optionDef.summary: Long millisecond interval for debugging flushing delays

optionDef.label: MaxFlushInterval
optionDef.summary: Maximum amount of microseconds to wait before writing to flush socket

optionDef.label: CoalesceTxQDepthCap

optionDef.summary: Enable or disable virtual machine swaps across nodes to improve memory locality

optionDef.label: TimeoutTMThreadLatency

optionDef.label: TimeoutTMThreadMax

optionDef.summary: Min number of timeout task-mgmt handler threads

optionDef.label: TimeoutTMThreadRetry

optionDef.label: TransFailLogPct

optionDef.label: UseAdaptiveRetries

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.defaultSize

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.logDir

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.logDirUnique
optionDef.summary: Place logs in a unique subdirectory of logdir, based on hostname.

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.logHost
optionDef.summary: The remote host to output logs to. Reset to default on null. Multiple hosts are supported and must be separated with comma (,). Example: udp://hostName1:514, hostName2, ssl://hostName3:1514

optionDef.label: CD-ROM sense time-out
optionDef.summary: Physical CD-ROM sense time-out in seconds

optionDef.label: PTEDisableNX
optionDef.summary: Disables the use of NX bit in user pagetable entries

optionDef.label: Read directory retries
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of retries when reading entries from directories

optionDef.label: ActiveDirectoryPreferredDomainControllers
optionDef.summary: Preferred Domain Controllers for Active Directory

optionDef.label: ActiveDirectoryVerifyCAMCertificate
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable verification of SSL certificate for vSphere Authentication Proxy server

optionDef.label: CIMEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM service

optionDef.label: CIMLogLevel
optionDef.summary: Set the log level of the CIM Service

optionDef.label: CIMWatchdogInterval
optionDef.summary: Set the watchdog polling interval for the CIM Service

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_hdrProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_hdr provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_hhrcwrapperProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_hhrcwrapper provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_kmoduleProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_kmodule provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_pciProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_pci provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_sfcbInteropProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_sfcbInterop provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_swmgtProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_swmgt provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_viProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_vi provider

optionDef.label: ESXiShellTimeOut
optionDef.summary: Time before automatically disabling local and remote shell access (in seconds, 0 disables). Takes effect after the services are restarted.

optionDef.label: EsximageNetRateLimit
optionDef.summary: Set the maximum rate, in bytes/sec, for downloading VIBs (0=no limit)

optionDef.label: EsximageNetRetries
optionDef.summary: Set the number of times to retry in case of failure while downloading VIBs

optionDef.label: EsximageNetTimeout
optionDef.summary: Set the timeout in seconds for downloading VIBs (0=no timeout)

optionDef.label: ProductLockerLocation
optionDef.summary: Path to VMware Tools and vSphere Client repository

optionDef.label: SuppressShellWarning
optionDef.summary: Do not show warning for enabled local and remote shell access

optionDef.label: FailVolumeOpenIfAPD
optionDef.summary: Fail VMFS volume open operation if the underlying device is deemed to be under an all-paths-down condition

optionDef.label: HardwareAcceleratedLocking
optionDef.summary: Enable hardware accelerated VMFS locking (requires compliant hardware). Please see http://kb.vmware.com/kb/2094604 before disabling this option

optionDef.label: MaxHeapSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the VMFS heap is allowed to grow

optionDef.label: OpenWithoutJournal
optionDef.summary: Open file system when out of space for journal allocation, allowing reads and no meta-data updates

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.assumeCommonBusClock
optionDef.summary: Assume all NUMA nodes run off a common, synchronous bus clock (normally autodetected).

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.assumePerNodeBusClock
optionDef.summary: Assume each NUMA node has a separate bus clock (normally autodetected).

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.busSpeedMayVary
optionDef.summary: Allow different APIC timer speeds on different CPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.checkCPUIDLimit
optionDef.summary: Refuse to run on CPUID limited cpus.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.checkPages
optionDef.summary: Check that free and free-lpage-pool pages are not corrupted.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.com1_baud
optionDef.summary: Baud rate for COM1.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.com2_baud
optionDef.summary: Baud rate for COM2.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.coresPerPkg
optionDef.summary: Number of cores per package that vmkernel should use

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.debugBreak
optionDef.summary: Break into debugger during vmkernel initialization.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.debugLogToSerial
optionDef.summary: 0=Serial debug logging off, 1=Serial debug logging on, 2=Defer to config option DebugLogToSerial.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableACSCheck
optionDef.summary: Bypass ACS capability checks on all PCIE devices

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableC1E
optionDef.summary: Disable C1E

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableCFOH
optionDef.summary: Disable Cache Flush on Halt

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableTurbo
optionDef.summary: Disable Turbo Mode

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.dmaEngineExposeIdentityMapping
optionDef.summary: Whether to expose whether DMA engines do identity mapping.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.fsCheck
optionDef.summary: Run filesystem checks on system partitions.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.gdbPort
optionDef.summary: gdb port; com1 or com2

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.generalCriticalMemory
optionDef.summary: Pages to reserve as general critical memory

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapCheckTimerInterval
optionDef.summary: Interval in seconds between heap timer checks

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapFreeOwnerCheck
optionDef.summary: Check heap ownership on free operations

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapFreePoisonByte
optionDef.summary: Byte pattern used to poison freed memory

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapMetaPoisonByte
optionDef.summary: Byte pattern used to poison red zones for allocations

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapMetadataProtect
optionDef.summary: Use poisoned red zones to protect against under/overruns

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapPoisonFreeMem
optionDef.summary: Poison free memory to catch use after free bugs

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapPoisonTimerChecks
optionDef.summary: Check heap poisoned areas for corruption on regular intervals

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.hyperthreading
optionDef.summary: Enable hyperthreading if available.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.ioAbilityChecks
optionDef.summary: Enforce checking of whether regions can be DMA mapped.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.ipmiEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable IPMI

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.logPort
optionDef.summary: Serial port to enable for logging; com1 or com2

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxLogEntries
optionDef.summary: Size of the kernel log buffer in 256-byte lines. 0=Use default. Min is 1024. Max is 32768.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxPCPUS
optionDef.summary: Number of PCPUs vmkernel should use.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxPCPUsNUMAInterleaving
optionDef.summary: Enable NUMA-node interleaving of enabled PCPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxRegisteredVMs
optionDef.summary: Max number of VMs which can be registered on a host. 0 == determine at runtime

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxVMs
optionDef.summary: Max number of VMs VMKernel should support. 0 == determine at runtime

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memCheckEveryWord
optionDef.summary: Check every single word when checking mem.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memLowReservedMB
optionDef.summary: Amount of low memory (< 4 GB) which gets reserved. 0 == determine at runtime

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memmapMaxPhysicalMemMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum physical memory (in MB) addressable by kernel.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netCoalesceTimerHdlrPcpu
optionDef.summary: Pcpu that coalesce timeout handler runs on.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netNetqueueEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable NetQueue support.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolLimitCap
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages period for the packet page pool.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolLimitPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages for the packet page pool per gigabyte.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolResvCap
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages to reserve for the packet page pool.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolResvPerGB
optionDef.summary: Number of pages to reserve for the packet page pool per gigabyte.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapHighMemMaxSize
optionDef.summary: Maximum size in MB of the high-memory pkt buffer heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapHighMemMinSize
optionDef.summary: Minimum size in MB of the high-memory pkt buffer heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapMaxSize
optionDef.summary: Maximum size in MB of the pkt buffer heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapMinSize
optionDef.summary: Minimum size in MB of the pkt buffer heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapUseHighMem
optionDef.summary: Whether to allocate high memory packet heap.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.nmiAction
optionDef.summary: Action on hardware generated NMI: 0=default (panic, unless changed by advanced config option), 1=enter debugger, 2=panic, 3=log and ignore (not recommended)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numPreAllocEmergencyWorldStacks
optionDef.summary: Number of pre-allocated world stacks for emergency pool.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numaLatencyLoops
optionDef.summary: Number of NUMA latency probing loops. 0 to disable latency measurement

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numaLatencyRemoteThresholdPct
optionDef.summary: Maximum measured memory access latency difference (in percent units) between 2 pairs of NUMA nodes for the pairs to be considered equidistant

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.overrideDuplicateImageDetection
optionDef.summary: Override duplicate ESXi image detection

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.pageSharing
optionDef.summary: Enable page sharing.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.poisonPagePool
optionDef.summary: Poison memmap pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.powerManagement
optionDef.summary: Enable CPU power management at boot

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.preventFreePageMapping
optionDef.summary: Prevent mapping of free pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.scrubIgnoredPages
optionDef.summary: Check pages that were ignored due to vmbIgnoreStartMPN and vmbIgnoreNumMPNs boot options.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.scrubMemoryAfterModuleLoad
optionDef.summary: Check all memory after each module load. This causes booting to be very slow.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.serialUntrusted
optionDef.summary: Disable serial port if UART misbehaves.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageHeapMaxSize
optionDef.summary: Maximum size in bytes of the main storage heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageHeapMinSize
optionDef.summary: Minimum size in bytes of the main storage heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxDevices
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of supported SCSI devices

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxPaths
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of supported SCSI paths

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxVMsPerDevice
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of VMs expected to use a given device

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tbootDebug
optionDef.summary: Option to enable debug logs from tboot.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.timerEnableACPI
optionDef.summary: Enable ACPI PM timer as system reference timer.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.timerEnableHPET
optionDef.summary: Enable HPET as system reference timer.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.timerEnableTSC
optionDef.summary: Enable TSC as system reference timer.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.timerForceTSC
optionDef.summary: Always use TSC as system reference timer.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tscSpeedMayVary
optionDef.summary: Allow different TSC speeds on different CPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tty1Port
optionDef.summary: TTY1 port; com1, com2 ... to enable

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tty2Port
optionDef.summary: TTY2 port; com1, com2 ... to enable

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.updateBusIRQ
optionDef.summary: Allow adding/removing busIRQ information

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.useNUMAInfo
optionDef.summary: Enable/disable NUMA-ness

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.usePCC
optionDef.summary: Enable use of Processor Clocking Control ACPI extension

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.uwSwap
optionDef.summary: Enable Userworld Swap.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vmkKeyboard
optionDef.summary: Enable vmkernel keyboard driver.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vmkacEnable
optionDef.summary: 0=Disabled, 1=Enforcing, 2=Do not enforce, just warn

optionDef.label: DaemonEnable
optionDef.summary: Enable the VProbes daemon and listen for clients

optionDef.label: DaemonInterface
optionDef.summary: Network interface that the VProbes daemon binds to (default = host interface)

optionDef.label: DaemonStrongBind
optionDef.summary: Ensure that VProbes traffic flows only via the specified network interface, if any

optionDef.label: Log level
optionDef.summary: vCenter agent logging level
